org.mapdb

Interface ConcurrencyAware

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Store, StoreBinary, StoreTx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BTreeMap, DB, HTreeMap, StoreDirect, StoreDirectAbstract, StoreOnHeap, StoreReadOnlyWrapper, StoreTrivial, StoreTrivialTx, StoreWAL

    public ConcurrencyAware

    Concurrency aware, can verify that its configuration is thread safe

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ConcurrencyAware.DefaultImpls
      Concurrency aware, can verify that its configuration is thread safe

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkThreadSafe()
      checks all subcomponents, if this component is really thread safe, and throws an exception if not thread safe
      boolean isThreadSafe()
      returns true if this is configured to be thread safe

    • Method Detail

        returns true if this is configured to be thread safe

        checks all subcomponents, if this component is really thread safe, and throws an exception if not thread safe
